snippet: Five months after surviving a horrifying goring, Juan José Padilla is returning to the bullring amid an intense debate in Spain over bullfighting.
abstract: Juan Jose Padilla is returning to the bullring, five months after suffering a horrifying goring; his decision comes amid an intense debate in Spain over bullfighting, attacked as a barbaric ritual by animal rights activists but defended by its supporters as a central component of Spanish culture.
lead_paragraph: Five months after surviving a horrifying goring, Juan José Padilla is returning to the bullring amid an intense debate in Spain over bullfighting.

headline.main: Bullfighter’s Return Stuns a Hardened Sport
headline.print_headline: Bullfighter’s Return Stuns a Hardened Sport
